name: Good Hell
description:
You will live the terrible experience of a camera with two arms ready
to dodge red balls, not to fall on the toxic cloud and not to be
demoralized by a god who cares about you.

Gameplay:You move fast, you can jump on walls and you can use the dash to reach other places.
By changing levels you will get the chance to do a loaded jump and an ultra fast slide.
Finally you will have the coolest weapon ever ......THE RAMPINO

-Be prepared to jump in the right way and at the right time.
-A Jumping on the walls with grace and ferocity.
-Learn to use the dash sparingly and quickly.
-Use everything you have available to complete the level and boast it with your friends.
-Use the grapple smartly and quickly.
-There is no SAVE in this game.
-Each round a different music.
-At the end of the level you have immense satisfaction in taking the BANANA
-Very difficult, not for the faint of heart but doable
